name: It Is Ticking
description:
The world is being attacked by terrorists, they use highly dangerous explosive devices to cause massive destruction in urban zones. You, A bomb-defusing expert, must take action to protect our nation's lives. As with every bomb you defused, the CCTV remains intact to help capture those terrorists. Precaution, these bomb has little time spare to deal with.

Analyze the way the electronic boards function and identify how to disable the detonator. Be careful though, cut wire cannot be reconnected and may cause to inevitable explosion. Every component has its own logic rule, try your best to stay away from the detonation trigger..... and hurry, there's no time left.

Introducing Workshop mode, interested in being a terrorist? You come to the right place, you can build your dream bomb from everything we provided !!! You can publish your bomb onto the Steam workshop without any difficulty, and everything is implemented inside the game, no external tool is required.

There're hundred of stages where you can test your logical thinking skill, if you can beat the last chapter with minimum retry, you are really good at critical and analyzing situation person.

Find a way, cut a wire, turn that switch,.... and remember..... IT IS TICKING.
